name: Ace Wolf
text: We had a a splendid 1st visit. I purchased some oil for my mother. The staff was very informative and helpful.

name: Allison R. Widener
text:
I called to ask about CBD oil for my pup who has cancer. The owner called me back quickly and gave detailed instructions on the products she has and advise on how to use them.
I can tell she takes pride in what she has in the store, and carries top quality product.
Her husband was in the shop when I arrived and was very kind and sympathetic to my situation.

I don't know how much time I have with my furbaby, but if she is still with me in a couple months when the oil runs out, I will definitely return here for more.

Thank you Herbal Toad for all your kindness, and for taking time to explain everything to me.

name: Cathy Green
text: Great customer service!  They helped me track down a stylist from salon who had cut my hair while I was in town for a funeral several years ago.  They walked a couple stores down to their new neighbor, Salon 126, to get me the name and number.  You really went above and beyond!

name: Stephanie Moore
text: It's a awesome place. And you can tell they know what they are talking about.

name: Samuel Coleridge
text: Great assortment of herbs and soaps! Great class!

name: Emily Pritchett
text: What a great shop for our town! Stephenie is an educated aromatherapist and is more than willing to provide individualized advice for whatever issue you have. This is a wonderful asset to Ozark.

resp.text: Thank you. We appreciate your business and you taking time to leave a review.

name: Shirley Beasley
text: The staff was very knowledgeable and they had exactly what I was looking for

name: Justin Dugans
text: Great place to shop and receive knowledge on essential oils, Stephanie is very helpful and honest along with the prices being great for the items.

name: Chris Hall
text: Love the soaps

name: Dustin Ingram
text: Easy to miss from 1st Ave as it is tucked in a short strip, but do not be deceived! Piper and Leaf has a wide and flavorful selection of hot and iced teas, samples available, and answers for all your questions. They also have a beautiful gift sample set. The Briar Patch tea is so tasty. This will be a regular stop on every future visit to Birmingham, but I may also take to their website to supplement in the meantime.

name: Carrie Rollwagen
text:
The magic of Piper & Leaf starts with the tea itself — it's phenomenal. They use a lot of locally sourced ingredients, and the flavors are unbelievable. The Old Fashioned Birthday Cake really does taste like birthday cake (I even get the unsweet version, and it still tastes that way — I don't understand it, but I'll take it.) I also love their chais and their seasonal flavors — well, it's really all pretty great.

Piper & Leaf is famous for their jars of iced sweet tea and their flavor selection, but they can also do unsweet tea and any of their teas hot as well. They have teas available to order and drink, and they also have loose leaf and sachets available. (Their loose leaf teas come in bags that can also act as tea strainers in a pinch, which is pretty great.) The loose leaf teas come with instructions for how to brew a cup of hot tea, a jar of iced tea, or even as a bigger batch if you're brewing for a large group. This location has coffee as well.

I've always had the friendliest service at Piper & Leaf — they take time to hear you out, help you find the tea that will work best for you, and make sure you leave happy. I couldn't recommend them more; their fans are extremely dedicated, and for good reason.

name: Grace
text:
Piper and leaf has definitely set itself apart from all other tea joints. The first time I tried P&L was in Huntsville and I was extremely excited when I heard about the Birmingham location. We can all take pride in this locally owned business and their down to earth attitude! My first time visit to the Woodlawn location was very similar to Huntsville, great people willing to serve and fill you in on anything you would like to know about the tea! Sammy is a wonderful employee and very helpful.

I love that they keep their customers up to date via social media at all times.
It's always worth the trip and I look forward to their possible grand opening in August.

name: I Branch
text: really nothing but enjoyable experiences here, i'll be back. the place has a cool atmosphere. they have a lot of great reviews for a reason.

name: debbie berry
text: the staff was very friendly and attentive. the bill was reasonable.

name: Shane Oliver
text: Piper and Leaf - A little pricier than the grocery store stuff. Best tea I have ever had.

name: M Mishka
text: Love piper and leaf, so happy they opened up a store closer to me than their Lowes mill location. Awesome tea and friendly workers. Great place to drink tea and chat.

name: Mandy Nobles
text: Awesome tea! Great staff and lots of food choices at Pizitz.

name: P Hill
text: Tea was wonderful, staff helpful, and love specials.

name: Morgan Rouse
text: found them at the market at pepper place farmers market and fell in love with their teas. will definitely make this a frequent stop!!!

name: Caleb Townes
text: Small and upcoming shop, but that does not take away from the great and friendly staff. Not to mention the amazing tea

resp.text:
Caleb,
Thank you so much for the 5 star rating a lovely review! We still have a lot of work to do. Thank you for being part of our building and growth process. Reviews on Google, Facebook, Yelp, etc really helps small businesses like us be found. We appreciate you!
Connor and the Piper and Leaf family

name: Amy Johnston
text: Must try the strawberry teas

name: Pieter Slinkman
text: Very good store, needed cardamom seeds and they even asked how many ounces I needed!

name: Laura Ledbetter Perez
text: Great store with very helpful employees, we love everything we got from them. Especially the drink mixes!

resp.text: Thank you Laura!

name: Dawn Mattox
text: Lovely shop. Great selection.

name: Laurie Rials
text: Great selection. Store is inviting with friendly & helpful staff.

resp.text: Thank you Laurie!

name: Jeff J
text: An awesome place to buy spices, teas, and salts. Super friendly and helpful. The spices are fresh and priced accordingly. I had been ordering spices from Morton & Bassett. Glad I found a local supplier quality products staffed by the owner and two others. A pleasant experience as a new resident of Fairhope.

name: Dale Zimmer
text: Awesome place! Lovely people that run it.

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Rich Nagel
text: Lots of options , very friendly staff

resp.text: Thanks!

name: SA Pressley
text: Love this Nutrition bar! Great shakes and teas! Great service too! Very friendly staff!

name: Terry Shea
text: Yummy loaded teas and nutritional shakes. I got the “Channel” loaded tea with collagen. Knowledgeable and friendly staff. Beautiful store.  I’ll be back!

name: Tori Davis
text: The best and kindest workers with the really great tea and cutest environment. 10/10 would recommend!

name: josey knox
text: Staff is so friendly and very helpful. They explained their menu thoroughly with great options.

name: Kelly Carter
text:
The teas are absolutely delicious!
Can’t wait to try the Shakes

name: Brad Allen
text: This is a great smoothie place! They are also pet friendly!

name: Mary Grace
text: Best place you’ll ever go to:)

name: Olivia
text: It’s a pyramid scheme, the teas/shakes aren’t healthy and don’t even taste good.

name: Lori White
text: Love this shop! The drink I usually order is the southern belle. It is absolutely amazing and helps me as a busy mom of three young ones make it through the day with energy. It’s also helps me stay hydrated which is so important. One drink could last you all day if you like to sip on things. I love the notes they add on the cups with a spiritual uplifting message. Jennifer and Madison are AMAZING! They really feel like family to me and always go the extra mile to make the customers happy. They are really the reason I keep going back. Don’t get me wrong the drinks are really really good but those ladies are so sweet and you always look forward to chatting with them. The owner does a great job and always makes sure the customers are well taken care of! Keep up the great work!

name: Jennifer Childress
text: LOVE Arab Nutrition!  Stop in and enjoy this cute quaint shop on main street and let the staff help you decide on an amazing shake (these are meal replacements) and boy are these good!  We have had the Tiramisu, Carmel Cappuccino and the Peanut butter cup one!  They also made a special one for me called Chocolate covered Banana!  The loaded TEAS are amazing and make you excited to start your day!  I tried Skinny Dipping and Steel Magnolias, they were both just WOW!

name: April Smith
text: Love love love this place!!! The staff is amazing!! They always answer any questions i have and help me decide what i want and need. It has become a family addiction.

name: Amanda Chastain
text: My daughter and I love Arab Nutrition. Their drinks are yummy and the staff is amazing. So happy Amy chose Arab for her shop.

name: Josh A
text: Always like this place.  Good service and great selection

name: Misty King
text: I LOVE my Arab Nutrition beauty drink in strawberry starburst! Great drinks and wonderful staff!

name: Sydney Daugette
text: I love the tea bombs! Bahama Mama is my favorite. Very friendly staff!

name: Brennan Lightsey
text: I am absolutely in love. Today was my second time going and they already remember me. The kind hearted workers and wonderful vibe of the store is amazing. Words can’t even explain how good the beverages are so I’ll just have to say to go try them out. Nothing but good experiences and Wonderful flavors.

resp.text: Thank you so much! It was our pleasure to meet you and we are so happy you love our drinks ❤️

name: Cristen Chandler
text: Love this place! I live in Tuscaloosa and was in Bham for the day and decided to stop by. The woman at the counter (not sure of her name, sorry!) was so kind and welcoming!! And the drink I got, Fuji Falls, was delicious as well! Thanks so much!!

name: Dazi “Nobody” Bazi
text: Love this spot as a matter of fact I'm headed there as we type!

name: A
text: All shakes are good I have tried!! Got the jelly bean tea yesterday and it was soo good.

name: Tracy Smith
text: Cahaba Nutrition is just around the corner from me. First of all, I can't tell you how nice you are treated from the moment you walk into the store. I've gotten to know the owner and she has a great product and gives fast and courteous service. Best part, the drive in window. If you try one of their loaded teas, you'll be back for more. Check them out.

name: Hayley DeFilippo
text: I absolutely love the Skittlez loaded tea! It was delicious and so refreshing! Super friendly service and lovely atmosphere. So glad they opened in the same plaza that I work in. My coworker and I are definitely going to be frequent customers!

name: Rachel Petry
text: New store with smoothies and protein tea! The owner is very nice and accommodating. Be sure to ask for further nutritional content to be aware of artificial colors/sweeteners/flavors.

name: ChaLestar Hill
text: I visited this place on a Friday and absolutely loved the Skittlez loaded tea. Needed some energy and it gave me all I needed!! Customer service rocks here too!!! Can’t hardly wait to try more flavors and some of the shake flavors also

name: Lizzy Morton
text: FYI it’s all herbalife products, which are known to cause liver damage.

resp.text: We are very forward with the products we sell and are proud to be part of the Herbalife community. Also, I have drank multiple shakes and teas for years and I have no liver, or any other organ, damage. If you would like to talk about the products- don’t hesitate to reach out.  Best wishes.

name: Katie Nabors
text: We got a shake and a tea and both were delicious. We will definitely be back!

name: Blade Cooper
text: Absolutely love this place!! Staff is always so helpful no matter how many questions you ask!

name: Kayla Hudson
text: Great vibes

name: Spirit Walker Adventures
text: This is such a gem of a yarn shop! I am so happy that I got to stop here and get some goodies on our trip before we headed back home. The owner was so nice and friendly! I got some knitting things I had never seen before in other shops. This is a must when I return to Gadsen again! I love everything about this shop! Thank you for this wonderful place!

name: Kat
text: Great yarn and tea shop.  Very customer friendly.  They have tables set up and you can bring your projects to get free help.  Free lessons.  Just browsing today.  Can't wait to come back.  Takes all the fear out of trying.

name: Dustin Martin
text: Absolutely fantastic shop. The owners are friendly and very knowledgeable. They make you feel comfortable and welcome. Tons of different types of yarn and an absolutely stunning variety of teas and honey. Well worth a visit. 5 stars because they won't let me give 6.

name: Donna Underwood
text: I love this yarn shop. If Pat doesn't have in stock what I need, she orders and gets it to me quickly. The expertise of the owner and employees in all things knitting helped me learn to knit. Friendly, cozy atmosphere along with the tea samples increases the welcoming feeling.

name: Bonnie Taylor
text: My favorite place. Love them all.

name: Melanie Nixon
text: Such a great little shop filled with so many different flavors of teas and such friend and helpful people working there!

name: Michelle Wood-Capolino
text: Excellent. Friendly atmosphere,  good service, helpful staff.

name: Amy Sight
text: This place has a very pleasant environment and an exceptional selection of teas and yarn! They also will help you with a knitting/crocheting project for free! Very friendly as well! I would recommend this place to anyone.

name: Pam Hill
text: Loved it.

name: Stephanie Pearce
text: Wonderful shop run by wonderful people!

name: Betty Boone
text: This is the best place for beginners, experts and everything in between!  I've crocheted and knitted since my grandmother's knee but was never very good because I couldn't do it "her way".  These ladies have sgown me that my way is just fine and to simple enjoy.   Since Christmas,  I have crocheted a baby blanket, started another and am now trying knitting.  All because of this wonderful little gem!

name: Sydney Tinney
text: Miss Pat and the lovely ladies here are amazing! They took the time today to show me the basics of knitting & introduce me to a new love.

resp.text: We're all very glad you came in. We hope to see a lot more of you

name: Amy Roe
text: Wonderful selection of teas. I got Blueberry and make it with honey. This coming from a non tea drinker.

name: Rebecca Weber
text: I enjoy going to Taming of the Ewe so much...great peaceful atmosphere, great selection of yarns, etc...Pat and Detta are such very good teachers...and patient and kind...you will be so glad you came...

name: Kelly E
text: Went in during Christmas to pick up some things for crafts. Super, and I mean super nice ladies there. Sorry to see it close soon.

resp.text: We aren't closed just moved across the street

name: Angela Whorton
text: Great yarn and teas.

name: Pamela Knott hill Yarn4life
text: Would live there

name: Jessica Pate
text: Beautiful yarn! Wonderful people!

name: Heather Richards
text: Awesome new place in west Homewood.  Very clean and nicely decorated. The owners and staff are always so helpful and nice. There are so many great Flavors to choose from with the Teas and Shakes. The donut hole shot is also one of my favorites.  So many options, you will want to try them all. Great options for Kids too, my kids love trying the different kid teas. So far Captain America and Nemo are their favorites. Highly recommend checking them out.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing review. We are so grateful for wonderful customers like you.

name: Justin L
text: This place is a pheunominal business. As an extremely active person and athlete, I value my health above everything. I love getting my combo (tea & shake). The shake helps refuel my body after a hard workout and the tea keeps me focused and energized throughout the day. Oh! Did I mention the staff goes above and beyond to help each and every customer that walks in the door. My son also loves the kids tea too! Try out the captain America and cinnamon toast.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing review. We appreciate your great feedback.

name: Courtney Lynn
text: I am SO obsessed with Homewood Nutrition! Very sweet and knowledgeable staff, and the teas and shakes are amazing! FIVE STARS! ❤️❤️

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review!

name: Tiffany Barnett
text: Homewood Nutrition is absolutely the “BEST” place to get delicious healthy drinks and shakes. I literally go there ever day. Great customer service (Beyond 5 stars). They have a fast and efficient service in the store and delivery. Try this place and you will NOT be disappointed. ❤️Tiffany Barnett

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing review. We are blessed to have wonderful customers like you.

name: M H
text: Great new place in Homewood.  Owner is welcoming and patient with me while I always want to try something new. Menu features many interesting and enticing flavors of teas and shakes. (there are more items but these are my "go-to".  So many options, you will want to try them all. Customer Service is excellent!!  Something you do not always find.  Tea flavors are unique names; however, the shakes are brownie batter, cookie dough, fruity peebles, butterfinger, etc... but without the guilt!  Give it a try, you will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us. We count ourselves blessed for customers like you. We look forward to bringing you your next tea!!!

name: Ashley Cox
text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this place!!! It’s so clean and the employees are very helpful and knowledgeable! I’ve never had a tea I didn’t like and the shakes are top notch! I’ve completely given up coffee and love that I now have a healthy alternative to get my energy boost for the day!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing review. We are so blessed to have customers like you. We appreciate your kind words.

name: Erin Callaway
text: The drinks here are AMAZING!! The staff is also so sweet & welcoming. Me & my fiancé visited last week & I had to come on here to brag about our experience. Definitely the best nutrition shop in town!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thank you so much for being such wonderful customers. We are blessed.

name: Autumn McNeil
text: I am an avid fan of these Nutritional Drink places, but this is the absolute WORST experience i’ve ever had as a consumer at any business ever. At first the business appeared to be rather tidy, but I was soon made aware of just how little this business seemed to be concerned with the pandemic. The employees did not wear masks, not even while preparing my drink, and the whole building smelled like dog. I could also see the employees reusing cups to make my drink without washing them. I will definitely not be returning to this location and would suggest to anyone that is interested that they just go to the Nutritional Drink establishment across town instead.

resp.text:
Unfortunately, we have no records that indicate that you visited our store. I have searched through our entire customer database. If you can please provide the date and time, we will happily review the cameras as we want to be sure our customer service is top notch. Masks are worn and teas are made in individual, disposable cups which would make it impossible to reuse a cup as you stated. As it stands now though, we have no record of your visit, your name, or a visit that matches your description, so please send me an email, personally, and we can get this taken care of for you immediately. Thank you so much. Otherwise, this will be considered a fake review as it is a plug for a competitor as stated in the post and should be removed immediately.
beverly@homewoodnutrition.com
jace@homewoodnutrition.com

name: meghan blueberry
text: I honestly wish I could give zero stars. I just left Homewood Nutrition and I will never be returning. I walk in and not a single person pays me any mind. They are clearly teenagers, sitting on their phones, not wearing masks. There were 2 young girls and one boy. After I ordered my drinks, the 2 girls started to CLEARLY whisper about me and laugh. This created a very uncomfortable environment in the store. They were very unwelcoming and had a bad attitude the entire time. This is completely unprofessional and I have never experienced such bad customer service. I love the drinks but it is sad that the employees treated me this way. I will not be returning.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear you had a bad experience. I see you posted on March 14 and that you had “just left”. I’m having trouble finding your name in our customer database. We will definitely investigate further and look at the cameras. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Customer service is our top priority and what you described sounds like just the opposite of what happens inside our store. If this is a fake review for a terminated friend, please kindly remove it.

name: KayLeigh Fitzgerald
text: Great experiences always! The owners are kind and super helpful, the service is great (not to mention how good the drinks are). Definitely my favorite around town!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing review. We are so grateful for your kind words.

name: Martha Howell
text: Homewood Nutrition is such a family friendly and welcoming environment. The staff is always helpful and informative about their product and prices. Will continue to support this local and small business!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing review. We are so grateful for your kind words.

name: Lauren Childress
text: Absolutely love this place and the staff here! They followed COVID protocol and were very clean which was comforting. Definitely recommend this place because it is very good and very healthy!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this wonderful review. We are blessed to have such awesome customers.

name: Tripz XL
text: Staff is super nice and helpful. They'll spark a conversation with you and love dogs

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We love our amazing customers and of course we LOVE dogs!

name: Lexi Scott
text: I LOOOVE this place. The employees are so nice and the owner is very personable. Won’t find better drinks anywhere.

resp.text: We appreciate the time you took to leave this amazing review. We are so grateful for your kind words.

name: Morgan Wurster
text: I have been wanting to try one of these nutrition places because I love flavored teas (specifically Starbucks peach green tea). These places are absolute rip offs. I tried it about 2 weeks ago and now all I have been seeing online is how (1) unhealthy these places actually are and (2) that they are MLMs. This definitely seemed like one of those... There were no prices listed and they convinced my fiancé to get a “combo” with a tea and peanut butter shake. On our way out, they told him that the shake isn’t “chalky” at all. It definitely was and didn’t taste like peanut butter at all. Paid almost $30 for something we just ended up throwing out. AND they asked us to promote them on instagram. I won’t be returning, especially since they weren’t wearing masks while preparing the drinks. Who knows what I drank, it tasted like cough medicine.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing these issues to our attention. We are sorry you were not satisfied with our products. If you should decide to give us another chance, please ask for one of the owners and we will make it right. In addition, we will be happy to show you the labels for every item that goes into our teas and shakes so you know exactly what you are consuming. We never "force" or "convince" anyone to get anything they don't want. We don’t serve anything to our customers that we don’t drink daily ourselves. As far as a the "chalky" taste, non of our shakes are chalky but they are in fact protein shakes (this is a nutrition shop, not McDonalds or Starbucks where you get a milkshake loaded with sugar). We would love for you to come in and we can help you select a different flavor. Again, we are sorry that your first visit was not what you expected and look forward to a second chance.

name: Brendyn Allen
text: I drive all the way from tuscaloosa just to get a drink! It’s such a great place I keep coming back to get more! If you don’t get a tea get a shake!!!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words and amazing customers like you.

name: Brooks B
text: Black Magic Loaded Tea, DELISH!

resp.text: Thank you! Glad you enjoyed :)

name: Lewis Barnett
text: Great people and great product!  I will continue to visit

resp.text: Thank you so much. We really appreciate you taking the time out to leave a review. We are blessed with customers like you. We look forward to your visit each day!!!

name: Jacquelyn Salceiro
text: Love the teas!! Staff is great!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Bailey Dill
text: The best nutrition place in town!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this awesome review.

name: Lisa Johnson
text: Great nutrition stop.

name: Blake Whitt
text: I honestly loved this coffee the first three weeks of them being open. But the last few times I’ve ordered a cold brew(which has been incredible in the past), I have received what I assume is nitro cold brew, but it tasted like club soda mixed with a funky coffee taste. Hopefully they figure out that something has changed and the cold brew does not actually taste like cold brew.

name: Bobby Lovell
text: Talk slow when you order.  Workers don’t seem to be trained or supervised. I discussed with the supervisor. Let’s see if they improve.

name: GARRY BARKSDALE
text: I had a Iced Coffee with a couple of extra shots this morning. It is wonderful..

name: Nicole Cecil
text: For a chain it's not bad coffee I enjoy the people who work there!

name: Rachel G
text: Great coffee and the employees are so nice!

name: Amanda Thomas
text: My new FAVORITE coffee shop!!!!... friendly, time efficient, and most importantly the ☕ is fabulous ☺️

name: Jean
text: This place is convenient being right off 72, but no one working there knows how to do T-Debit and it's very frustrating. The other one in Madison never has issues with it.

name: Sendero7mm
text: Always nice, coffee and sandwich was good as well

name: Kristian Campbell
text: Well I decide to go try this coffee out. Ask over 3 times for regular coffee. Guy proceeds to tell me it take 7 mins. Well isnt that your job?? Anyways i didn't get coffee I had to drink the coffee with caramel in it after telling him 3 times I want regular coffee I won't be back! He needs another job obviously! I told him 5 times i didn't like caramel as well! That might be why your drive thru is empty!

name: Doug Johnson
text: Great coffee and far far better than Starbucks. I just wish there was one closer by instead of driving from Madison to Athens!

name: Malorie Casey
text: Balanced Nutrition of Arab is my FAVORITE place to go, you cannot beat their refreshing and energizing teas! Any flavor you get is AMAZING! The products are great but the service is even better! They always have a positive, welcoming attitude and a smile! With all of this combined you will want to go everyday!  Balanced Nutrition of Arab is truly unlike the rest! ❤️

name: Dylan Coville
text: This is the best experience!!! I wake up every morning and go and try a new and exciting flavor every day!! Would rate this 100/100 stars

name: ReBecca Cochran
text: Awesome folks. Great drinks. Go see these folks.

name: Martisa Marshall
text: I had a wonderful experience at this nutrition shop! Very friendly staff and the store looks so warm and welcoming! Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a meal replacement shake or an energizing tea! Also, if you’re pressed for time you can call in your order and they’ll have your order waiting for you! Love love love!!!

name: Chad Gilreath
text: Great people! Fast Service! #lovepotion

name: Jessica Gilreath
text: So good! 10/10 would recommend! Great drinks, shakes, waffle, and people!

name: Adam Tripp
text: Came in Saturday, Loved the ocean drive tea bomb! I’ll be back soon!

name: Michael Hickman
text: Great service,  prepermint hot chocolate was our favorite.
